meanings.definition: Beyond the authority of the law.
meanings.sent1: The secret society operated in an extralegal manner, avoiding any legal oversight.
meanings.sent2: The vigilante's actions were considered extralegal by the authorities.
meanings.sent3: The extralegal party in the forest turned out to be a surprise birthday celebration.
meanings.sent4: Her extralegal methods of solving mysteries were like a detective from a novel.
meanings.sent5: The extralegal activities of the rebels painted a vivid picture of defiance against the law.

meanings.sent1: The unauthorized construction was deemed extralegal by the city council.
meanings.sent2: The counterfeit goods were sold through extralegal channels.
meanings.sent3: The extralegal parking spot turned out to be a cleverly disguised trap.
meanings.sent4: Her extralegal shortcuts in the race were like bending the rules of a game.
meanings.sent5: The extralegal trade of rare artifacts made the black market thrive.
